text: Harold Gordon Shipp (January 21, 1926 â€“ September 7, 2014) was a Canadian businessman and philanthropist. He was the chairman of Shipp Corporation Limited. He was born in East York of Toronto, Ontario. Shipp died after a short illness at the Trillium Hospital in Mississauga, Ontario on September 7, 2014, aged 88.Mississauga philanthropist Harold Shipp dies at age 88, The Mississauga News ==References== Category:1926 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Businesspeople from Ontario Category:Canadian philanthropists
title: Harold Shipp
